name: Peruvian Straight
description:
The highest-quality extensions is Virgin Hair.

Visage's Virgin Hair still possesses the cuticle layer, which is the outermost part of the hair strand.

All virgin hair has the cuticle layer of the hair flowing in the same direction, flowing the way it would naturally.The cuticle layer is important when concerned with hair tangling, and the longevity of the hair. Visage Hair can last up to 2 years if taken care of properly. When the cuticle layer is intact and flat, the hair is capable of reflecting light,
so that the hair shines. 

Each bundle is 4oz 
We recommend that the hair is washed before installing.However, we know some virgin hair smells when first purchased. At Visage Virgin Hair Boutique we DO NOT have that problem.  

Please select our Hair care tips link to find out how to properly take care of your Visage Hair.
